thread.title: U.S. bans export of weapons to South Sudan

title: U.S. bans export of weapons to South Sudan
text:
U.S. bans export of weapons to South Sudan 8:21pm GMT - 01:03 
The United States announces a ban on the export of weapons and defence services to South Sudan, ramping up pressure against President Salva Kiir to end a civil war that has killed tens of thousands of people. Jillian Kitchener reports.   
The United States announces a ban on the export of weapons and defence services to South Sudan, ramping up pressure against President Salva Kiir to end a civil war that has killed tens of thousands of people. Jillian Kitchener reports.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/02/02/us-bans-export-of-weapons-to-south-sudan?videoId=390464720&videoChannel=13422
